sourcesContent:
// ** Custom Components import Avatar from '@components/avatar' // ** Reactstrap Imports import { Table, Card } from 'reactstrap' // ** Icons Imports import { Monitor, Coffee, Watch, TrendingUp, TrendingDown } from 'react-feather' const CompanyTable = () => { // ** vars const data = [ { img: require('@src/assets/images/icons/toolbox.svg').default, name: 'Dixons', email: 'meguc@ruj.io', icon: , category: 'Technology', views: '23.4k', time: '24 hours', revenue: '891.2', sales: '68' }, { img: require('@src/assets/images/icons/parachute.svg').default, name: 'Motels', email: 'vecav@hodzi.co.uk', icon: , category: 'Grocery', views: '78k', time: '2 days', revenue: '668.51', sales: '97', salesUp: true }, { img: require('@src/assets/images/icons/brush.svg').default, name: 'Zipcar', email: 'davcilse@is.gov', icon: , category: 'Fashion', views: '162', time: '5 days', revenue: '522.29', sales: '62', salesUp: true }, { img: require('@src/assets/images/icons/star.svg').default, name: 'Owning', email: 'us@cuhil.gov', icon: , category: 'Technology', views: '214', time: '24 hour', revenue: '291.01', sales: '88', salesUp: true }, { img: require('@src/assets/images/icons/book.svg').default, name: 'Cafés', email: 'pudais@jife.com', icon: , category: 'Grocery', views: '208', time: '1 week', revenue: '783.93', sales: '16' }, { img: require('@src/assets/images/icons/rocket.svg').default, name: 'Kmart', email: 'bipri@cawiw.com', icon: , category: 'Fashion', views: '990', time: '1 month', revenue: '780.05', sales: '78', salesUp: true }, { img: require('@src/assets/images/icons/speaker.svg').default, name: 'Payers', email: 'luk@izug.io', icon: , category: 'Fashion', views: '12.9k', time: '12 hours', revenue: '531.49', sales: '42', salesUp: true } ] const colorsArr = { Technology: 'light-primary', Grocery: 'light-success', Fashion: 'light-warning' } const renderData = () => { return data.map(col => { const IconTag = col.salesUp ? ( ) : ( ) return (
{col.name}
{col.email}
{col.category}
{col.views} in {col.time}
${col.revenue}
{col.sales}% {IconTag}
) }) } return ( {renderData()}
Company Category Views Revenue Sales
) } export default CompanyTable
